song.title: Center
song.lyrics:
[v] . G And You're the center of the universe .D/F# C Everything was made in You, Jesus .G Breath of every living thing .D/F# C Everyone was made for You
[P] . C D You hold everything together
[C] . G D/F# C Oh, Christ, be the center of our lives . C2 G Be the place we fix our eyes . D/F# C Be the center of our lives
---
[B] .G D/F# We lift our eyes to heaven .C C2 And we wrap our lives around Your life .G D/F# C We lift our eyes to heaven, to You
[Ending] . G G/F# G/C And turn your eyes upon Jesus . G/F# D And look full in His wonderful face . G G/F# G/C And the things of earth will grow strangely dim . G G/C In the light of His glory and grace
song.presentation: C C V P C C B B C ENDING
